data.description:
"Xambr" is a new platform for virtual experiences that allows you to enjoy world-class virtual events from a variety of devices, including VR equipment, PCs, and smartphones.

By accessing Xambr, you can experience high-quality and interactive virtual spaces from anywhere in the world. These include virtual exhibitions for games and art, real-time virtual viewing of e-sports, and virtual music concerts that surpass reality.

Key Features and Characteristics:

"Multiplatform" capabilities allowing players to participate in the same environment, regardless of whether they are using VR equipment, a PC, or a smartphone.
Rich graphical expressions that are supported not only on PCs but also on smartphones.
"Avatar Communication" and "Voice Chat," enabling real-time enjoyment between players.
"Non-verbal Communication" through text chats, various emojis, and effects.
"Timeline Events" that start at specific times, allowing all players to enjoy simultaneous experiences.
"Quests" that offer various rewards.
Customizable controls for each player, including movement and rotation methods that minimize motion sickness even in VR.

changelog.change_log: We have implemented a set of new features to improve the experience.

Performance improvements have been implemented.
Fixed various minor bugs.

- Release a new user block feature.
- Support connections for up to 500 users in the same room. Look forward to enjoying this at the upcoming X-NEOKET event.
- Improve overall stability.

Improved VRoidHub avatar behavior.

Increased the information available for viewing on the profile screen.

VRoidHubとの連携に対応し、利用可能なルームにおいてVRoidHubに登録したモデルをアバターとして使えるようになりました。


Supported VRoidHub integration, allowing use of VRoidHub-registered models as avatars in available rooms.
Improved operational stability.  動作の安定性を改善しました。

特定の条件下で、アプリがクラッシュすることがあった問題を修正しました。
Fixed an issue that could cause the app to crash under certain conditions

errors.message: A server error field_exception occured. Check server logs for details.
